articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website
articles.contents:
This website is an open website to contain tutorial methods on
agent-based modeling. Feel free to contribute using our github
repositories.

articles.title: Social Dynamics Hub
articles.description: Welcome to this open course on modeling complex social dynamics. We have prepared several modules as an interactive learning experience for you. Feel free to explore them in any order.

articles.title: Einführung in Netlogo
articles.description:
Welcome to this tutorial to Netlogo. This tutorial is completely **in German** and consists of several videos that guide you in learning Netlogo.
The videos were recorded as companions videos for a seminar held at the RWTH Aachen University.

Willkommen zu diesem Tutorial zu Netlogo. Dieses Tutorial besteht aus mehreren Videos, die Sie beim Erlernen von Netlogo unterstützen.
Die Videos wurden als Begleitvideos für ein Seminar an der RWTH Aachen aufgenommen.
articles.contents:
Netlogo installieren
Um Netlogo nutzen zu können, sollten Sie zunächst Netlogo
installieren. Sie finden Netlogo hier.
Schritt 1 - Einleitung


Link YouTube
Video: 1 - Einleitung Agentenbasierte Modellierung
Schritt 2 - Netlogo Modelle
Next up we look at the segregation model as an agent-based model.
Please watch the video from the following URL.
